mapper.select: SELECT r.* FROM sys_role r, sys_user_role ur WHERE r.role_id = ur.role_id AND r.del_flag = 0 and ur.user_id IN (#{staffId})

SELECT `role`.role_id, `role`.role_name, `role`.role_code, `role`.role_desc, `role`.del_flag, `role`.create_time, `role`.update_time FROM sys_role AS `role`
`role`.del_flag = '0'
and `role`.role_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.roleName},'%')
and `role`.role_desc LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.roleDesc},'%')
ORDER BY `role`.create_time DESC

select sys_role.* from sys_user left join p10_ins_outles_user on p10_ins_outles_user.user_id = sys_user.user_id and p10_ins_outles_user.del_flag = 0 left join p10_staff_role on p10_staff_role.staff_id = p10_ins_outles_user.user_id left join sys_role on sys_role.role_id = p10_staff_role.role_id and sys_role.del_flag = 0 where sys_user.del_flag = 0 and sys_user.user_id = #{userId} and p10_ins_outles_user.ins_id = #{insId} and p10_ins_outles_user.outles_id = #{outlesId} and sys_role.role_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{roleCode},'%')
